entries.title: Google Maps Chief Sees New Directions for Digital Navigation
entries.description: A more immersive experience is coming to map tools, says Google Geo head Christopher Phillips

entries.title: U.S. House Bans TikTok on Phones of Representatives and Staff
entries.description: Action follows a ban on the TikTok app in executive-branch agencies, enacted as part of the recently passed spending bill.

entries.title: Amazon Unionization Stalls Amid Turnover, Firm's Efforts
entries.description: Organizing is set to continue at Amazon and other companies but may proceed more slowly and take years to play out, labor researchers say.

entries.title: China Resumes Approving Foreign Videogames
entries.description: Ending a halt stretching back to June 2021, China has resumed granting publishing approvals for foreign videogames.

entries.title: Crypto Customers Sell Claims at a Loss to Avoid Bankruptcy Wait
entries.description: Hundreds of FTX, Voyager and Celsius customers are parting with their accounts, selling for pennies on the dollar to deep-pocketed investment firms.

entries.title: With New EVs Arriving, Brand Loyalty Goes Out the Window
entries.description: As more car makers roll out electric vehicles, they are discovering that early customers are far more apt to try new brands.
